metadata.title: Practice Languages with AI Tutors & Real Teachers | Easy Speak
metadata.description: Easy Speak combines adaptive AI teachers and professional human tutors for effective language learning. Get personalized speaking practice, receive instant feedback on your pronunciation, and achieve fluency faster.

home.title: Welcome to EasySpeak
home.subtitle: A modern Next.js 15 template with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and more
home.description: Start building amazing web applications with our production-ready boilerplate featuring the latest technologies and best practices.

homePage.descriptionSection1: Our language learning application offers an anonymous and secure environment for teachers and students. With crypto payments, you can enjoy the benefits of a decentralized currency without the need for traditional banking information.
homePage.blockPayDescription: Effortless transactions: embrace the future of payment
homePage.blockLearnDescription: Experience the benefits of anonymous language learning
homePage.blockDiscoverTitle: Discover the power of our app
homePage.blockDiscoverDescription: Learn at your own pace with our easy-to-use interface
homePage.titleSection3: Discover our innovative Language Learning App
homePage.descriptionSection3: Our application offers a range of benefits for both teachers and students. Teachers can easily create and manage their language courses, while students can enjoy a seamless learning experience with speaking lessons and personalized feedback.
homePage.blockStep1Title: Join our language learning community today!
homePage.blockStep1Description: Signing up is quick and easy. Begin your journey by creating a profile. The app helps students explore lessons and  teachers showcase their expertise.
homePage.blockStep2Title: Explore lessons and connect with the right match
homePage.blockStep2Description: Discover a diverse range of lessons. For students, find the perfect teacher, and for teachers, showcase your lessons to connect with eager learners.
homePage.blockStep3Title: Start your journey to learn a new language
homePage.blockStep3Description: Finalize your connection by booking lessons (for students) or getting booked (for teachers). Pay with crypto and start the learning journey!
